snippet: Twelve Nobel Peace laureates have written a letter to President Hu Jintao of China, urging him to engage in “meaningful dialogue” with the Dalai Lama to address Tibetans’ frustrations.
abstract: Twelve Nobel Peace laureates write an open letter to Chinese Pres Hu Jintao, urging him to engage in 'meaningful dialogue' with the Dalai Lama to ease Tibetans' frustrations over Chinese policies.
lead_paragraph: Twelve Nobel Peace laureates have written a letter to President Hu Jintao of China, urging him to engage in “meaningful dialogue” with the Dalai Lama to address Tibetans’ frustrations.

headline.main: China: Nobel Winners Urge Tibet Talks
headline.print_headline: China: Nobel Winners Urge Tibet Talks
